fem package¶

Submodules¶

fem.base_fspace module¶

class fem.base_fspace.BaseFunctionSpace(domain, spaces)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base Function Space factory. params: - domain: geometrical domain with dolfin mesh - spaces: collection of Space objects with Finite Element type, polynomial order, space dimension

property function_spaces¶

fem.struct_templates module¶

class fem.struct_templates.AcousticConstants(gamma, Re, Pe)¶

Bases: tuple

property Pe¶

Alias for field number 2

property Re¶

Alias for field number 1

property gamma¶

Alias for field number 0

class fem.struct_templates.Space(element_type, order, dimension)¶

Bases: tuple

AcousticConstants is a template tuple that defines necessary constants for acoustic problem with viscosity and heat conductivity: - gamma: heat capacity ratio, C_p / C_v. Default: 1.4 - Re: Reynolds number - Pe: Pecklet number

property dimension¶

Alias for field number 2

property element_type¶

Alias for field number 0

property order¶

Alias for field number 1

fem.tv_acoustic_fspace module¶

class fem.tv_acoustic_fspace.ComplexTVAcousticFunctionSpace(domain, order=2)[source]¶

Bases: firecrest.fem.base_fspace.BaseFunctionSpace

Template function spaces for complex Thermoviscous Acoustic FEM problem.

property pressure_function_space¶

Picks pressure function space from generated function_spaces.

property temperature_function_space¶

Picks temperature function space from generated function_spaces.

property velocity_function_space¶

Picks velocity function space from generated function_spaces.

fem.tv_acoustic_fspace.DEFAULT_TVACOUSTIC_SPACES(order)[source]¶
class fem.tv_acoustic_fspace.TVAcousticFunctionSpace(domain, order=2)[source]¶

Bases: firecrest.fem.base_fspace.BaseFunctionSpace

Template function spaces for real Thermoviscous Acoustic FEM problem. Chosen function spaces are: - Pressure(scalar, order = 2), - Velocity(vector, order = 2), - Temperature(scalar, order = 1).

property pressure_function_space¶

Picks pressure function space from generated function_spaces.

property temperature_function_space¶

Picks temperature function space from generated function_spaces.

property velocity_function_space¶

Picks velocity function space from generated function_spaces.

fem.tv_acoustic_weakform module¶

class fem.tv_acoustic_weakform.BaseTVAcousticWeakForm(domain, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: firecrest.fem.base_weakform.BaseWeakForm, abc.ABC

Base class for Thermoviscous acoustic weak forms generation.

allowed_stress_bcs = {'force': 'Neumann', 'free': 'Neumann', 'impedance': 'Robin', 'inflow': 'Dirichlet', 'normal_force': 'Neumann', 'normal_velocity': 'Neumann', 'noslip': 'Dirichlet', 'slip': 'Neumann'}¶
allowed_temperature_bcs = {'adiabatic': 'Neumann', 'heat_flux': 'Neumann', 'isothermal': 'Dirichlet', 'temperature': 'Dirichlet', 'thermal_accommodation': 'Robin'}¶
boundary_components(trial, test)[source]¶

Generates momentum (stress, velocity) and thermal (heat flux. temperature) boundary components of the TVAcoustic weak form equation.

I expect the usage should be something like:

bcond = {"noslip" : True, "heat_flux" : 1.}

density(pressure, temperature)[source]¶
dirichlet_boundary_conditions(is_linearised=False)[source]¶

Generates DirichletBCs on all appropriate boundary elements.
